page.title: 02Steeple Bumpstead School.
page.content: {The Junior School}in{Church Street}was built in 1848 and was enlarged in 1875.There are 4 classes,one for top infants and 1st year juniors,one for 1st and 2nd year juniors,2nd and 3rd year juniors,and 3rd and 4th year juniors.The school was originally a {National}school owned by the Church of England,but now it is owned by Essex County Council.The old school has a very small playground, a swimming pool and outdoor toilets.We are soon going to have a new school.{The Infant {school}was built in 1977.There are two classrooms, a small quiet room, a large hall, cloakrooms and a staff room.There are two playgrounds and a big playing field.The old school is going to be sold. At present we have 150 children in school, 6 teachers,a headmistress and a secretary. The school is growing all the time.
